doc.title: Zelenata kashta
doc.plot: 'Brother, will you give me your bones when you pass away? Since you won't need these I'll take them. And then I'll give your bones to other men to use them again.' The old-clothes man takes us in the carnival, mummer's night feasts of winter where the masks, possessed by 'sacred insanity', enact the intrigues and conflicts of our 'green house' - the Earth.
